Name: Pineapple Daiquiri (Frozen)
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with a scoop of crushed ice and serve with a straw.
Review: A tad fluffy but very tasty.
Nutrition: One serving of Pineapple Daiquiri (Frozen) contains 226 calories
